name: ANTHOCYAN 25 Wild Blueberry Extract
description: ANTHOCYAN 25 Wild Blueberry Extract are produced in France by our partner Ferlux, a company with a history of over 50 years in the field of extraction. The Trueberry concept is characterized by the use of high quality fruit, transparency from cultivation to extraction as well as high purity and standardization. These extracts are standardized to high anthocyanin contents of up to 36 %. In addition, the respective anthocyanin profile is qualified via LC-MS and quantified by uHPLC in relation to Cy-3-glc.
